logger.doc:name: Log INFO : Start Update CBVR Flow
logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 import modules::jsonlogger output application/json ---
jsonlogger::main(payload: { "status": "Starts", "uuid" : uuid(), "message": "Before the flow to update the Benefit Verification Requests", "maskFields": [], "appName": app.name, "ip": server.ip, "flowName": flow.name })]

salesforce:query.salesforce:salesforce-query: select Id,Leg_External_Id__c, MemberPlanId,CoverageBenefit.Name, CoverageBenefit.MemberPlanId, CoverageBenefit.IndividualInNetworkDeductibleRemaining,CoverageBenefit.IndividualInNetworkOutofPocketRemaining, CoverageBenefit.IndividualOutofNetworkDeductibleRemain, CoverageBenefit.IndividualOutofNetworkOutofPocketRemain from CareBenefitVerifyRequest where LastModifiedDate = TODAY
select Id, IsActive, IsInPlanNetwork,CoverageBenefit.Name from CoverageBenefitItem where LastModifiedDate = TODAY

ee:variables.ee:set-variable:
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.covBenfitItem map ((item, index) -> { Id : item.Id, Name: item.CoverageBenefit.Name, IsActive: item.IsActive, InNetwork: item.IsInPlanNetwork
}) orderBy($.Name)

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.covBenVerifyReq map((item, index) -> { Id : item.Id, External_id: item.Leg_External_Id__c, IndividualInNetworkOutofPocketRemaining: item.CoverageBenefit.IndividualInNetworkOutofPocketRemaining, IndividualOutofNetworkOutofPocketRemain: item.CoverageBenefit.IndividualOutofNetworkOutofPocketRemain, IndividualInNetworkDeductibleRemaining: item.CoverageBenefit.IndividualInNetworkDeductibleRemaining, IndividualOutofNetworkDeductibleRemain:item.CoverageBenefit.IndividualOutofNetworkDeductibleRemain, Name: item.CoverageBenefit.Name,
})orderBy ($.Name)

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/csv lineSeparator = '\r\n', quoteValues = true import * from dw::core::Strings --- vars.BenVerifyReq map ((item, index) -> {
Status: (if(vars.benfitItem.IsActive[index] == 'true' and vars.benfitItem.Name[index] == item.Name and vars.benfitItem.InNetwork[index] =='true') (if(item.IndividualInNetworkDeductibleRemaining > 0 and item.IndividualInNetworkOutofPocketRemaining > 0) 'Completed' else 'Error') else if (vars.benfitItem.IsActive[index] == 'true' and vars.benfitItem.Name[index] == item.Name and vars.benfitItem.InNetwork[index] =='false') (if(item.IndividualOutofNetworkDeductibleRemain > 0 and item.IndividualOutofNetworkOutofPocketRemain > 0) "Completed" else "Error" )else "Error"), Leg_External_Id__c: item.External_id })

logger.doc:name: Log INFO : End Update CBVR Flow
logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 import modules::jsonlogger output application/json ---
jsonlogger::main(payload: { "status": "Starts", "uuid" : uuid(), "message": "Updated the Benefit Verification Requests Successfully.", "maskFields": [], "appName": app.name, "ip": server.ip, "flowName": flow.name })]
